title: TabTab
description:
🚀 Boost Your Browser Tabs Management with TabTab!
If you often have multiple browser tabs open and find it hard to manage them, TabTab is definitely for you! It not only helps you save your tabs but also allows you to drag and arrange the tab cards freely, creating an intuitive workspace. You can easily organize your frequently used tabs into categories and switch between them effortlessly, without having to dig through a mess of tabs.
